body.name: Baby Trend Tango Travel System, Veridian
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 36 mins
features: Super-fast one-hand fold is 30% more compact and stands when folded
Lightweight, sleek design provides easy maneuverability
Cell phone positioner accepts portrait and landscape modes and extra-deep, flex-grip cup holders
Large storage basket with front and rear access
Comfort Cabin with over-sized canopy with UPF 50+ protection, premium padding and dual suspension
Includes the Ally 35 Infant Car Seat and LATCH-equipped Base; stroller is also compatible with other Baby Trend infant car seats
Ally 35 Infant Car Seat accepts infants from 4-35 lbs
EPS energy-absorbing foam for superior side impact head protection
5-point safety harness with easy one-hand harness adjustment and push-button release
body.description: Indulge yourself with the perfect blend of quality, comfort and style when you and your child experience The Baby Trend Tango travel system together. The lightweight, nimble stroller holds an abundance of features that you both will enjoy. Parent premiums include convenient compact one-hand quick fold, a large storage basket with front and rear access, a contemporary parent console with cell phone positioner and two extra-deep flex-grip cup holders that will keep your large water bottles secure. Your child will appreciate the exclusive comfort Cabin, complete with an extra-long canopy and visor with built-in UPF 50+ protection, Deluxe fabrics with premium padding and dual frame suspension to ensure a smooth ride. When folded, the Tango stroller is 30% more compact. Turn the stroller into a travel system by combining the Tango stroller with the included Ally infant car seat. The Ally infant car seat features higher, deeper side wings with EPS foam for optimal side impact protection, a 5-point safety harness and a 4-position height adjustable base. It accepts infants from 4-35 lbs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: It's Time to Tango! Meet our new Baby Trend Tango Travel System
UPF 50+ canopy for optimal sun protection Extra-long canopy with visor provides shade in every direction Reclining seat Comfort Cabin with deluxe fabrics and premium padding

One-hand standing fold using in-seat strap Super large storage basket with front access holds toys, diapers, and daily necessities Large basket allows for rear access Parent console with cell phone positioner and cup holders

The Baby Trend Ally Infant Car Seat is included! Turn the stroller into a travel system by combining the Tango stroller with the included Ally Infant Car Seat. The Ally features higher, deeper side wings with EPS foam for optimal side impact protection, a 5-point safety harness and a 4-position height adjustable base. It accepts infants from 4-35 lbs.
Large storage basket with front and rear access Our Baby Trend Tango Travel System has a super-large storage basket that enables parents to store groceries, toys, diaper bags, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Looking, Affordable, Lightweight Combo
reviews.reviewText: I had to be a bit frugal with this purchase, so I was pleasantly surprised how great it was when we unboxed it. It is a gorgeous dark teal and black and would easily be suitable for boy or girl. The carseat that is part of the set was the surprising factor. It is very well-made and the pull-up shade pulls way over to protect baby from bright light, wind, and unwanted touches and kisses during this pandemic. It easily converts without any hassle. My granddaughter was very pleased as was I. My only complaint was the need for a cuddler to keep the baby's head snug and supported while he's tiny. We were able to find one that fit the seat and matched perfectly here on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it for the price point
reviews.reviewText: We've been using this since having our baby the first week of March. At first I would have rated this as three stars as I think there are better seats out there for newborns. Our baby was born at 8 pounds 4 ounces, and he just seemed so uncomfortable in the car seat. I will say, read the instructions carefully (and not like us sleep deprived second timers haha) because there's a way to get the car seat to recline while anchored. Now that our little one has put on a few pounds he fits really well in the car seat and seems comfy.The way the car seat snaps into the stroller is... Odd. Granted it's been 10 years since my first baby, but it sits precariously on the stroller where the front that faces you feels like it can tip, while the back that snaps in seems secure. We've used it a lot at this point and no issues so I guess this is just how travel systems are made nowadays.The only annoying thing about the stroller is there's a latch on the side that can be irritating to move in order to open up the stroller. It collapses just fine though. If it helps too, it's a decent size when folded. It fits easily into our Altima's trunk, but is a very tight squeeze in our Rogue Sport's trunk. The space under the stroller is great for a full sized diaper bag (we use a backpack) and the cupholders for the parents are nice too.Overall, I'd recommend as the price is great and it functions very well. Honestly the turquoise color is what attracted it to me in the first place, and it's just as pretty in person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buena calidad para el precio
reviews.reviewText: Para el precio tiene muy buena calidad y es fácil de montar

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not too bad!
reviews.reviewText: The price for both a car seat and stroller was not bad at all. The colors are great, easy to assemble and overall a very nice set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how amazing the quality is!!! The color is absolutely stunning and am so pleased I can not wait to test my son in it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Super Smooth
reviews.reviewText: I had trouble pulling it out of the box, but after some help from my husband, it was a breeze setting everything up. I love how smooth it rolls over various surfaces. The car seat detaches from the base or stroller very easily. The color is fantastic and true to pictures. I've never had a stroller that's this easy to fold down either. All you do is pull up firmly on the handle hidden in the seat and boom it's done!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel system!
reviews.reviewText: I love it! It isn’t hard to put together, it doesn’t seem cheaply made, really good material and soft fabric. The wheels are tough, they work great in any kind of ground. It’s amazing for the price, I’ve seen a lot of more expensive travel systems and they don’t stand a chance with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: As a first-time parent, I was nervous about buying a stroller and car seat. The product itself is beautiful, great, soft but sturdy materials. It wheels around smoothly, easy to assemble and use. Very satisfied with my purchase.
